content: **enfin en français allons j ai pris moins de 10 ans - ** this is more a recipe than a pattern - i am truly happy with the success of this hat i still like to see all the variations people keep inventing in september 2009 this pattern have also been published in the charity ebook a hat in time if you like it please consider helping a worthy cause and buy the book you can also find more information about the book on this blog a hat in time 1 en français 2 in italiano now 3 thank you annatec and now in spanish 4 thank you matilde gambetta 5 1 https //ahatintime blogspot com/ 2 https //filambulle blogspot chain/2016/08/noro-hat-en-francais html 3 https //filambulle blogspot chain/2013/08/noro-spiral-hat-in-italiano html 4 https //filambulle blogspot chain/2014/10/noro-hat-en-espanol html 5 https //misagujas blogspot chain/
